sentences.sentence: The spatial distribution of Aphis glycines was studied.
sentences.translation: 对大豆蚜的空间分布型进行了研究。

sentences.sentence: APHIS offers some Suggestions of ways to keep away predators.
sentences.translation: APHIS提供一些的方法建议来赶跑食肉动物。

sentences.sentence: APHIS doesn't spell out many details in its announcement, posted in the April 7 Federal Register.
sentences.translation: APHIS在它于4月7日发布在《联邦纪事》的公告中并没有透露太多细节。
